title: Field emission and field ionization in liquid helium under pressure.
abstract: We report the first observations of field emission/ionisation in liquid helium under pressure. Our preliminary data are presented, and discussed, for pressures, tip potentials and temperatures in the range 0 < P < 25 atm, 0 < V < 3kV, T> 1.5 K
